scikits.statsmodels.robust.norms.HuberT.weights¶

HuberT.weights(z)¶

Huber’s t weighting function for the IRLS algorithm

The psi function scaled by z

Parameters:

z : array-like

1d array
Returns:

array :

weights(z) = 1 for |z| <= t weights(z) = t/|z| for |z| > t
